thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trump Signs Banking Bill, Adding to Regulators’ To-Do List

author: Ryan Tracy
title: Trump Signs Banking Bill, Adding to Regulators’ To-Do List
text:
WASHINGTON—Sixteen months after Donald Trump took office, financial regulators have a crowded to-do list. It grew even longer Thursday, as the president signed into law a bipartisan bill enacting some long-sought changes to the industry rule book.
“This is all about the Dodd-Frank disaster, and they’ve fixed it, or at least gone a long way toward fixing it,” Mr. Trump said as he signed the Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act, a product of months of negotiations among Republican and Democratic lawmakers,...
